course_title: Management of Sexual and Reproductive Health in Primary Care
class_notes: This section is for ENP, FNP, and AGPCNP students only.
course_description: Family and Emergency nurse practitioner students will integrate knowledge and skills from co-requisite courses in preparation for managing sexual and reproductive health conditions within primary care. Emphasis is on health promotion, health maintenance, and risk reduction strategies.
prerequisites: NRSG 528 and NRSG 544 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 4258, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 10a-12p, Instructor: D. Clement, Status: Open
